DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Aging may affect person 's vision . Vitamin E and/or selenium may help prevent cataract age-related macular degeneration men receive drug part clinical trial prevention prostate cancer . DOC.brief_title: S0000B : Vitamin E and/or Selenium Preventing Cataract Age-Related Macular Degeneration Men SELECT SWOG-S0000
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To test whether vitamin E and/or selenium reduces risk visually significant age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) men enrol SELECT ( SWOG-S0000 ) . - To test whether vitamin E and/or selenium reduces risk cataract participant . Secondary - To test whether vitamin E and/or selenium reduces risk advance AMD participant . - To test whether vitamin E and/or selenium reduces risk cataract surgery subtypes participant . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Data medical record obtain participant 's ophthalmologist optometrist review . Information record use confirm baseline report age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) well 6-month annual report new diagnosis AMD cataract ( cataract surgery ) make since start study . Detailed questionnaire also obtain participant 's ophthalmologist optometrist provide information report AMD cataract diagnosis ( e.g. , date initial diagnosis ; best-corrected visual acuity time diagnosis ; date visual acuity first note 20/30 bad [ different date initial diagnosis ] ; pathological finding observe AMD first diagnose [ e.g. , drusen , retinal pigment epithelial hypo/hyperpigmentation , geographic atrophy , retinal pigment epithelial detachment , subretinal neovascular membrane , disciform scar ] ; pathological finding observe visual acuity first note 20/30 bad ; date exudative [ wet ] AMD first note ; presence ocular abnormality could explain contribute visual loss ; whether AMD cataract , , significant enough cause vision reduce 20/30 worse ; whether laser treatment photodynamic therapy perform AMD ; date cataract extraction ; etiology cataract [ e.g. , age-related , traumatic , congenital , inflammatory , surgery- steroid-induced ] ; cataract type [ e.g. , nuclear , cortical , posterior subcapsular , ] ) .
